Test Piece Contest
Songs of Scotland
Kingston-upon-Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire, England, UK Promoted by Groves Amateur Horticultural Society. Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £4, 5th £2. Best soprano - Hull Waterloo. Best trombone - Selby. Best cornet and euphonium - Lindley. 7 bands competed.
Nov. 8, 2011, 1:48 p.m. June 25, 2018, 8:56 a.m.
